## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Extension enhancement
- [ ] Task system improvement
- [ ] Snippet addition/modification

## Which Implementation Method?
- [ ] Task System (`.vscode/tasks.json` + `add-csp.js`)
- [ ] Extension (`extension/`)
- [ ] Snippets (`.vscode/vite-csp.code-snippets`)
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Other (specify):

## Testing Checklist
- [ ] Tested Task: "Vite: Add CSP Configuration"
- [ ] Tested Task: "Vite: Add CSP Source"
- [ ] Extension compiles without errors
- [ ] Extension tested in Development Host
- [ ] Snippets expand correctly
- [ ] Tested with TypeScript Vite project
- [ ] Tested with JavaScript Vite project
- [ ] No console errors
